short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows the user to select multiple sections of text, highlight those selections, and export them as a single text document.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MultiSelect allows you to select multiple snippets of text on a page, highlight them, and download them as a single plaintext file.
